ojc.bain.neuron

Class FixedProtocolNeuronConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • ojc.bain.base.ComponentConfiguration
      • ojc.bain.base.NeuronConfiguration
        • ojc.bain.neuron.FixedProtocolNeuronConfiguration

  • public class FixedProtocolNeuronConfiguration
extends NeuronConfiguration
    A neuron model that produces pre-determined spike patterns. The spikes are modelled as instantaneous transitions between the resting potential and the spike potential.
    Author:
    Oliver J. Coleman

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      double spikeDuration
      The duration of a spike in seconds.
      double spikePatternPeriod
      Presentation period of spike pattern, in seconds.
      double[] spikeTimings
      Times of the start of spikes relative to the start of the protocol, in seconds.

      • Fields inherited from class ojc.bain.base.NeuronConfiguration

        restPotential, spikePotential

      • Fields inherited from class ojc.bain.base.ComponentConfiguration

        name

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FixedProtocolNeuronConfiguration()
      Create a FixedProtocolNeuronConfiguration.
      FixedProtocolNeuronConfiguration(double spikePatternPeriod, double[] spikeTimings)
      Create a FixedProtocolNeuronConfiguration with a custom firing pattern.

    • Field Detail

      • spikePatternPeriod

        public double spikePatternPeriod
        Presentation period of spike pattern, in seconds.

      • spikeTimings

        public double[] spikeTimings
        Times of the start of spikes relative to the start of the protocol, in seconds. Spike start times should be less than (spikePatternPeriod + spikeDuration), otherwise they will be truncated.

      • spikeDuration

        public double spikeDuration
        The duration of a spike in seconds. Default duration is 1ms.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FixedProtocolNeuronConfiguration

        public FixedProtocolNeuronConfiguration()
        Create a FixedProtocolNeuronConfiguration. This is only used for retrieving a configuration singleton.

      • FixedProtocolNeuronConfiguration

        public FixedProtocolNeuronConfiguration(double spikePatternPeriod,
                                double[] spikeTimings)
        Create a FixedProtocolNeuronConfiguration with a custom firing pattern.
        Parameters:
        spikePatternPeriod - The total length of the pattern (s).
        spikeTimings - An array containing the times (s) of each spike, relative to the beginning of the pattern.
